articles.description: The entertainer has stayed relatively mum about the incident involving Smith at the Oscars, briefly addressing it at a few comedy shows since the shocking occurrence.
articles.content:
Chris Rock was seen in New York City on Monday going for a walk, days after Will Smith received a 10-year ban from the Academy Awards after slapping the comedian during the March 27 show.
The 57-yea… [+3931 chars]

articles.title: Killing Eve Series Finale Betrays Its Audience - The Mary Sue
articles.description: Killing Eve has just cliché-queerbaited itself into the history books of a perfectly cast show that had no idea what its audience wanted.
articles.content:
At some point, you just wish tired tropes would die out.
Spoilers for Killing Eve Series Finale.
Last night, on the Killing Eve finale, Villanelle died. The killing of an iconic anti-heroine sapphi… [+3400 chars]

articles.title: Ed Sheeran sent cheeky Birmingham City demand after surprise appearance - Birmingham Live
articles.description: The Shape Of You singer was in phenomenal form alongside Blues supporters in Birmingham
articles.content:
Birmingham City fans have been reacting to the frankly incredible video of Ed Sheeran having a singalong in a pub in Small Heath.
